Body:
Description: Hi team,

we have a CAP policy which is used Content detection rule threshold however the CAP report always shown wrong count number. For example:
- policy is block and report
- Ignore threshold is OFF
- file contains 20 emails and 16 phone numbers
- content detection rule threshold: email (20) OR phone (20)
- Sending file is blocked as expected however CAP report only shown count number is 18 and Matched Item shows 16 phone entries and 2 email entries
From my view, the count number must be 20 and matched item should be 20 email entries. 
Could you please explain the CAP report I reported here?
All relevant info in attached file
Regards
Linh

Next Steps Updated: 2025.03.07 Update from R&D:

"After looking into the logs, I found what happens and managed to reproduce this issue on my machine, too. 
I am currently working on a fix for this. I will return with an update and a test build if the fix works right."

What We've Learned Updated: The customer report he sees only 18 items in the log instead of 20 as set in the CAP policy.

Actual Results *
18 items shown in log
Expected Results *
20 items shown in log
Steps to reproduce *

- policy is block and report
- Ignore threshold is OFF
- file contains 20 emails and 16 phone numbers
- content detection rule threshold: email (20) OR phone (20)
- Sending file is blocked as expected however CAP report only shown count number is 18 and Matched Item shows 16 phone entries and 2 email entries

Workaround provided, if any
N/A
Environment:*

- Customer Name: TrustingSocial
- ACV: 12,732.99
- Components: CAP
- OS: Mac
- EPP Server Version: 5.9.4.0
- Agent Version: 3.0.3.1009
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Linh Hoang

What We've Learned Updated: Created a remote session but Linh did not had time to show up.
Sent note to follow up.
Next Steps Updated: Will wait for his response.
